description: The National Microbiology Laboratory Guelph (NML Guelph) located at 110 Stone Rd W in Guelph Ontario Canada, has a requirement for the services of an experienced and skilled Autoclave Technician for the provision of autoclave maintenance and repair service on a scheduled and as and when requested basis. The Contractor must have the ability to provide security cleared, skilled Autoclave Technicians with experience working on equipment technically comparable to the units detailed in the Statement of Work. The anticipated contract period is from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2025 with three (3) additional twelve (12) month option periods.
